class.name: AudioEffectRecord
class.brief_description: Audio effect used for recording sound from a microphone.

method.name: is_recording_active
method.description: Returns whether the recording is active or not.

method.name: set_recording_active
method.description: If [code]true[/code], the sound will be recorded. Note that restarting the recording will remove the previously recorded sample.

members.member: Specifies the format in which the sample will be recorded. See [enum AudioStreamSample.Format] for available formats.
